name: Oaxaca Cathedral
description: A beautiful historic cathedral in the heart of the city.

name: Monte Albán Ruins
description: Ancient Zapotec ruins with incredible views of the valley.

name: Benito Juárez Market
description: A bustling market with local food, crafts, and textiles.

name: Hierve el Agua
description: Natural rock formations and mineral springs resembling waterfalls.

name: Ethnobotanical Garden
description: A garden showcasing Oaxaca's rich plant diversity.

name: Tule Tree
description: One of the widest trees in the world, over 2,000 years old.

name: Textile Museum of Oaxaca
description: Museum dedicated to traditional and contemporary textiles.

name: Mitla Archaeological Site
address: San Pablo Villa de Mitla, Oaxaca
description: Pre-Columbian site with intricate stone mosaics and tombs.
